articles.title: India Weightlifting squad at Asian Games 2023: Full team, Schedule, Medal chances - The Bridge
articles.description: Indian Weightlifters at Asian Games 2023: Can Mirabai Chanu win India's first Weightlifting medal in 25 years at the Asian Games? Can she even win a first-ever gold medal?
articles.content: Mirabai Chanu and Bindyarani Devi are the two Indian Weightlifters at the 2023 Asian Games in Hangzhou, looking to win a first ever gold medal for the country or the first medal of any colour in 25 y… [+3124 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Dominant Nikhat Zareen seals Paris Olympics berth by assuring first Asian Games medal - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Nikhat Zareen advanced to the semifinal of the women's 50kg boxing to seal her place at the Paris Olympics next year.
articles.content: Reigning world champion Nikhat Zareen assured India its first boxing medal at the Asian Games 2023 with a thumping win over Hanan Nassar in the quarterfinals of the women's 50kg event. By advancing t… [+1949 chars]
